```{r}
path = "D:/data  science programming/data_science/week 2/data CO2/CO2.xlsx"
path2 = "D:/data  science programming/data_science/week 2/data GDP/GDP.xlsx"
 
library(readxl)
c = read_excel(path)
a = read_excel(path2)

library(dplyr)
CO2 <- select(c,"Country Name","1960","2000")
GDP <- select(a,"Country Name","1960","2000")

data_merge<-merge(CO2, GDP, by="Country Name")
data_merge

```
